Description:
Style, sophistication & a happening location
Perfectly matched to its happening locale - near trams, Smith St & myriad amenities - this dynamic 2-bedroom (BIRs) apartment stylishly complements contemporary living while providing a relaxing retreat. Meticulously designed to maximise space, & with a pleasing interior decor, the home includes open living room (rev-cyc A/C) with thoughtfully designed kitchen (wenge-look cabinetry, s/s appliances, & a breakfast bar). Sliding doors lead to a balcony with rooftop vistas. But that's not all! There's a communal rooftop area, security entry, chic bathroom/laundry, basement carpark, intercom entry, & more...
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790
Insights: 83 other 2 bedroom unit in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
SHARP RENOVATION, COOL ADDRESS!
This light-filled late Victorian residence, renovated in crisp contemporary style, offers a versatile floor plan in a prime location within easy walking distance of Smith and Queens Parade cafes, and close to freeway access and the CBD. Entry from the front verandah is to a hallway opening to a large bedroom, suitable for use as a second living area or home office. The centrally positioned living room flows through a cut-out wall to a sunny dining zone and kitchen, fitted with Smeg appliances and stainless steel benchtops; tall brushed-metal doors open to the north-facing paved outdoor entertaining area. A fitted laundry to one side has an entry to a right-of-way. Also on the lower level is an elegant basalt-tiled bathroom. Upstairs are two very large bedrooms, both with storage space; the main bedroom has views over Fitzroy to the CBD. This fine property features polished timber and concrete floors, gas heating, and period architectural detail.

Description:
QUALITY CONTEMPORARY APARTMENT FLOODED WITH NORTH LIGHT!!
This stunning 8.5 sqs approx. 2nd floor north facing apartment flooded with light & perfectly situated at the rear of this boutique (8 only) apartment building facing Little Wellington Street - offers a quiet and spacious living environment with great outlooks and a terrific lifestyle location close to every inner city attraction. The modern & newly built apartment showcases a unique buying opportunity - security intercom entrance, 2 bedrooms (both with built in robes), modern bathroom & separate laundry, stylish open plan kitchen, spacious living & dining zones opening to a private, extra-large north facing terrace with great views. Also include is a secure under cover car park - 1 car & storage cage! Conveniently positioned close to Smith St & Gertrude St shops/cafes, transport and only moments to East Melb, Fitzroy Gardens & CBD. If you are looking for a smart investment or stylish inner city apartment that offers so much more than most other apartments on the market - then take a look now! Note: Previously leased for $550 per week or $2383 pcm approx.
Features: Split system Reverse cycle cooling and heating.

Description:
HISTORIC DOUBLE-FRONTED VICTORIAN: SPACE AND SECLUSION
This charming tuck-pointed residence close to Queens Parade, primary schools and neighbourhood cafes offers an exceptionally versatile floor plan and larger living spaces than are usual in Collingwood. Set behind a high fence and a courtyard garden, its lace-trimmed verandah is adorned with a mature strawberry grapevine, probably planted when the house was built ca 1890. Entry is to a wide central hallway, opening to four double bedrooms and a large mosaic-tiled bathroom, fitted with separate bath and shower and a marble benchtop. Set to the rear is a well-equipped timber kitchen, open to a large dining room and expansive living areas flowing through walls of glass to a tranquil brick-paved courtyard and BBQ area.
The deep block is bordered by a brick double garage with right of way access, a second bathroom/laundry and WC. Featuring Baltic floors, open fireplaces and split-system air conditioning, this light-filled urban oasis offers comfortable living now, with exciting potential for further renovation.
Insights: 3 other 4 bedroom house in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
EXTENDED AND RENOVATED TO PERFECTION!
Quite simply one of Collingwoods finest homes, this rare double-front Californian on a wide block of land presents an unmatched executive lifestyle of luxury, space and inner-city ease. Architecturally designed, to provide the perfect balance of period elegance and modern-day style, the homes light-filled interior showcases three large bedrooms (all with BIRs), deluxe ensuite and main bathroom, fully-fitted study/library, granite-bench kitchen with Bosch/Ilve appliances and superb open-plan living/dining area complete with open fireplace and big sliding doors to al-fresco entertaining deck and landscaped backyard garden. Other stand-out features include ducted heating/refrigerated cooling, alarm, high ornate ceilings and polished timber floors, authentic fretwork and lead-light windows, attic storage, modern laundry, plus garage (remote) and additional off-street parking space in front. Serene, secure and brilliantly positioned, its close to cafes and restaurants, freeway access, trams and trains to the CBD.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Prime location at an affordable price
This is the perfect entry into the Collingwood market and at a price that will make you smile. Currently tenanted and returning $260 per week and located in a prime central position you are only moments from Smith Street, Brunswick Street and Gertrude Street as well as being a stone's throw from the CBD. The property features an open plan kitchen, meals and living, large separate bedroom and separate bathroom. Add to an existing portfolio or the perfect starter for those looking to enter the market.
Please Note:
This is strictly student accommodation.

Description:
FAMILY ACCOMMODATION!
This instantly attractive double storey terrace offers a fabulous city-edge lifestyle opportunity moments from shops, cafes and transport options. Spacious and versatile, the homes pristine interior boasts three generous bedrooms (master with robes), renovated and spacious central bathroom, open lounge and dining area complemented by a renovated kitchen. Other features include split-system air conditioning, high ceilings, polished timber floors, sunny north-facing backyard to the rear with secure off-street parking option via roller door. A vibrant location, its an easy stroll to Johnston Street shops, eastern freeway, trams and trains to the CBD.

Description:
EXECUTORS AUCTION
This free standing Victorian terrace cottage requires total renovation (or redevelopment, STCA) but there are definite attractions. It offers spacious rooms two double bedrooms, a living/dining room, a timber-fitted kitchen and bathroom/laundry has abundant natural light, and opens to a courtyard with potential off-street parking. The buzzing caf life of Smith Street and public transport are within a few minutes walk. Here is a great entry level opportunity seize it and reap the rewards!

Description:
AUCTION - Saturday May 4th at 11.00AM
Four Levels of Lifestyle With Roof Top Entertaining
Minutes from the heart of the CBD, this sensational modern townhouse boasts generous 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom accommodation over four light filled levels. Completely in sync with an inner city lifestyle, sophisticated living and entertaining dimensions enjoy sleek stone finishes, polished timber floors and the outstanding flexibility of 3 separate outdoor domains, a brilliant roof top terrace with heated spa and views to the City skyline. Set back amongst a secure gated group, a courtyard entry introduces a ground level living room with home theatre capability, first floor main bedroom with WIR/ensuite plus 2 further double bedrooms, each with BIRs and a family bathroom. Above on the third level, open plan living/ dining spaces incorporate a chic Blanco appointed kitchen extending to a sunny northern dining terrace. Ducted heating and cooling, video intercom security and remote double garaging add comfort and convenience to perfect peace and privacy just an easy walk from both Gertrude and Smith Streets, Fitzroy Gardens and Victoria Parade trams.
Insights: 18 other 3 bedroom unit in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
EDWARDIAN CHARACTER MEETS CONTEMPORARY ELEGANCE
Renovated with style and flair, this inviting Edwardian terrace has all the essentials for a relaxed city-edge lifestyle, within easy walking distance of Smith Street cafes, the Convent arts precinct, the Darling Gardens and transport. A security porch opens to a wide arched hallway, from which run two double bedrooms -- the second with a wall of built-in wardrobes and a window to a light court and a sleek fully-tiled bathroom with quality fittings. A superbly proportioned high-ceilinged living and dining area is open to the kitchen, stylishly fitted with premium stainless steel appliances and cabinetry, granite benchtops and splashbacks. Concertina doors open to a concealed laundry and storage space. The living zone flows to a delightful paved outdoor living area, with off-street parking from a right-of-way and a storage room. This charming property features japanned floors, open fireplaces with intricate overmantles, leadlighting, decorative plasterwork, ducted heating and split-system air conditioning. See it and be delighted!
Insights: 29 other 2 bedroom house in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
Cute, affordable and what a great location!
This single fronted workers cottage is by no means huge but is certainly big on â€˜personalityâ€™ offering a delightful abode with plenty of charm and character in a location to be envied and enjoyed. Within walking distance to the eclectic eateries and specialty shops of Smith & Brunswick Streets the home is extremely comfortable having been updated and extended some 20 years ago but still offers plenty of scope for further improvement.
Offering a flexible floor plan of 2 bedrooms, 2 living areas, basic but functional kitchen with electric upright stove, bathroom with laundry facilities and a pleasant easterly facing courtyard with right of way access at the rear.
Ideal for the devoted inner city dweller on a budget, first home buyer looking to buy within close proximity of the CBD or the astute investor wanting a strong return and assured future capital growth...

Description:
Quality contemporary apartment flooded with north light!!
Facing Lt.Wellington St, this spacious (8.6 sqs approx.) 2nd floor north facing apartment is flooded with light & perfectly situated at the rear of this boutique (8 only) apartment building. Offering a quiet and modern living environment in this terrific lifestyle location close to every inner city attraction. The modern & newly built apartment showcases a unique buying opportunity - security intercom entrance, 2 bedrooms (both with built in robes), modern bathroom & separate laundry, stylish open plan kitchen, spacious living & dining zones opening to a private, extra-large north facing terrace with great views. Also included is a secure under cover car park - 1 car & storage cage! Conveniently positioned close to Smith St & Gertrude St shops/cafes, transport and only moments to East Melb, Fitzroy Gardens & CBD. If you are looking for a smart investment (currently leased on a monthly tenancy @ $2383 pcm - $550 pw approx) or stylish inner city apartment that offers so much more than most other apartments on the market - then take a look now!
Features: Split system Reverse cycle cooling and heating

Description:
HISTORIC CORNER RESIDENCE, RIPE FOR RENOVATION
Here is a great opportunity to restore an historically significant property with two street frontages and a right of way to the rear, close to transport and freeway access and ten minutes away from the CBD. Its intriguing exterior detail includes arched windows surmounted by decoration of steers heads, suggesting that the building may originally have been a butchers shop and dwelling. The property, with Baltic pine floors, an open fireplace and interior plaster ornament, offers several large rooms (potentially three bedrooms) and a spacious bluestone courtyard, with a garage entered from Perry Street.

Description:
STUNNINGLY REBUILT FOR FAMILY LIVING!
Behind a charming 1920s facade, here is an exceptionally spacious contemporary residence, rebuilt to the most exacting standards. Opening from the fretwork-trimmed front veranda is a high-ceilinged hallway, leading off to three large bedrooms -- all with built-in wardrobes, and two with elegant porcelain-tiled ensuites. A third bathroom incorporates a spa bath, dual shower, and concealed laundry. The living and dining area across the rear of the house is a breathtaking space - 68 sq.m. approx - designed for large scale entertaining. It is open to a state-of-the-art kitchen, fitted with generous storage, Caesar stone bench tops and premium appliances. The living area flows out on two sides through double-glazed cafe style doors to a delightful paved and landscaped courtyard garden. Features include ample off-street parking, blue gum flooring and pure wool carpets, ducted heating, individual split-system air conditioning, plus alarm and data cabling systems. This light-filled CBD-fringe property is close to Brunswick Street, Queens Parade, cafes, transport and Gold Street Primary School.
Insights: 24 other 3 bedroom house in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
EAST MELBOURNE FRINGE
Brilliantly located on the border of East Melbourne , Abbotsford and Richmond this large town residence offers exceptional living space, privacy and security. From a neat Japanese-style garden, the property opens to a large home office/guest bedroom, with a door to the remote entry garage and laundry. First floor accommodation comprises three good-sized bedrooms the main with fully-tiled ensuite and walk-in wardrobe and a second tiled bathroom with over-bath shower. An expansive living and dining room, floored in gleaming timber, flows out to a private outdoor living area; the kitchen, enlarged by the present owners, is fitted with quality cabinetry and appliances and stone bench tops. On the upper level a large roof terrace with gas-plumbed BBQ gives stunning views from the CBD to Studley Park. This well-located property features ample storage, split-system air conditioning, video entry, back-to-base alarm system and premium fittings.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
PRICE REDUCTION!
Situated in a quiet pocket on the East Melbourne fringe, this contemporary apartment is only moments from Melbourne's cultural hub.
The light-filled residence comprises spacious open plan living and dining area, 2 generous bedrooms with built-in robes, stylish gourmet kitchen with stone benchtops and a sparkling central bathroom with laundry facilities. A prized north facing balcony bathes in natural light. Secure off street parking plus loads of storage.
Within easy reach of the CBD and the vibrant art, dining and entertainment precincts of Smith and Brunswick Streets & a short stroll to the CBD. Ideal for first home buyers and investors.
